text: Five Easy Pieces is a 1970 American drama movie directed by Bob Rafelson and stars Jack Nicholson, Karen Black, Susan Anspach, Sally Struthers, Toni Basil. It was nominated for four Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1971. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 drama movies Category:1970s road movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Bob Rafelson Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Washington (state)
title: Five Easy Pieces
